title: An Ancient Baba Vanga Prophecy Returns to the Spotlight
description: Just days before the end of 2025, a prediction attributed to the Bulgarian mystic Baba Vanga, whose real name was Vangelia Pandeva Gushterova, has once again gained traction across social media and international outlets. The vision, linked to major geopolitical events, has resurfaced in a global context marked by military tensions and recent astronomical phenomena. title: How to party like an ancient Greek
description: The ancient Greeks had a reputation for holding wild parties. But that’s not the only way to party like an ancient Greek.
